item.name: Steps
item.description: Operations about steps, step instances, and status management.

item.name: Get steps with hierarchical filtering for runsheet

request.name: Get steps with hierarchical filtering for runsheet

description.content:
Retrieves step instances grouped by sequence and phase for runsheet display.
Supports comprehensive hierarchical filtering to show only steps matching the specified criteria.
Multiple filters can be combined for progressive refinement.
Results are ordered by sequence number, phase number, and step number.
Filter steps by plan instance ID
Filter steps by sequence instance ID
Filter steps by phase instance ID
Filter steps by owning team ID
Filter steps by label ID (steps that have this label)

response.name: Steps grouped by sequence and phase for runsheet display

description.content: Filter steps by plan instance ID

Filter steps by phase instance ID
Filter steps by owning team ID
Filter steps by label ID (steps that have this label)

description.content:
REST API for the Unified Migration and Implementation Governance (UMIG) application.

This API follows RESTful principles and is implemented using ScriptRunner Groovy scripts. It supersedes the V1 API.
Architectural principles are documented in ADR-017.
